title: Want to know why refund rates on IP are so low?
body:
Because of this answer by Riot Cactopus

https://i.gyazo.com/b9e1743e807c7e094c2058591275a8f3.png

Apparently the reason why high cost runes and low cost runes, that are of the same category, have the same refund rate is because it'll be easier for us to calculate how much blue essence we'll be getting.
Does Riot think we don't know basic math? Are we seriously being rejected a better refund rate, simply because they think we shouldn't take an extra 10 seconds to figure out the difference between a 2050 quint and a 515 quint?

Link to comment:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/o1hsbxt5-the-real-reason-veteran-players-are-unhappy-with-the-rune-rework?comment=001b
